channel.title: Serverstatus.php
channel.description:
Ok im trying to add serverstatus with awardspace using this TuT http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,119509.0.html.
I added the tables but still get the same error here.
Warning: mysql_connect(): Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (2) in /home/www/runestream.awardspace.com/serverstatus.php on line 11
Warning: mysql_select_db(): Access denied for user 'runestream'@'82.197.131.19' (using password: NO) in /home/www/runestream.awardspace.com/serverstatus.php on line 12
Warning: mysql_select_db(): A link to the server could not be established in /home/www/runestream.awardspace.com/serverstatus.php on line 12 Could not connect to the Database
Can someone help me or give me another TuT on adding a serverstatus page.

item.title: Serverstatus.php
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

did u fill out

$host=‘localhost’; // this is usually localhost, but might be something else
$username=‘DATABASE USERNAME’; //database username here
$pass=‘DATABASE PASSWORD’; //database password here
$database=‘DATABASE NAME’; // database name here

in the script?

Read full topic
